segments.text: What are you going to do for one year abroad , Tom ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Study , study , study . I want to learn a lot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are going to take courses ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I am going to take some university courses there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but I think it's probably for the best .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey , I am a pretty cool guy . I will make friends , and I'll have a lot of extracurricular activities too . You know , like fencing , or theater or something .
segments.speaker: S2
